title.value: Add and Edit Row, Column, and Slider to PageBuilder from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that basic adding and editing of multiple content types work correctly in the Staging Dashboard area of PageBuilder.

title.value: verify that user can move content types from on-hover option menus from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can move content types from the on-hover option menus within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: verify that user can add child content types from on-hover option menus from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can add child content types from the on-hover option menus within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can edit content types from the on-hover option menus within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can duplicate content types from the on-hover option menus within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: Verify that user can move slide items from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can move slide items within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: Verify that user can move tab items from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is intended to ensure that users can move tab items within the PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: Verify that full-screen mode covers entire screen from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is to ensure that the PageBuilder full-screen mode covers the entire screen when opened for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: Left panel is full-height and works in full-screen mode from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is to ensure that the PageBuilder left panel works and grows to span the full height of the viewport in full-screen mode when opened for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: Can add and edit content types in full-screen mode from Staging Dashboard

description.value: This test is to ensure that the user can successfully add and edit content types in full-screen mode when opened for Staging Dashboard.

title.value: PageBuilder is visible from Staging Dashboard in CMS Page

description.value: This test is to ensure that the user can see and add a content type in PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard in a CMS Page.

title.value: PageBuilder is visible from Staging Dashboard in CMS Block

description.value: This test is to ensure that the user can see and add a content type in PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard in a CMS Block.

title.value: PageBuilder is visible from Staging Dashboard in Catalog Products

description.value: This test is to ensure that the user can see and add a content type in PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard in Catalog Products

title.value: PageBuilder is visible from Staging Dashboard in Catalog Category

description.value: This test is to ensure that the user can see and add a content type in PageBuilder stage for Staging Dashboard in Catalog Category.
